Translations.Text: Ara smarana karo! Phiris‌tara balalena -- ''he mariyama! Niscaya'i allah tomake nirbacana karechena, ara tomaya pabitra karechena, ara bisbajagatera saba narira upare tomaya nirbacana karechena.
He mariyama! Tomara prabhura anugata haye theko, ara sijada karo o ruku karo rukukaridera sathe.’’

E hacche adrsya bartasamuhera theke ye-saba tomara kache amara pratyadista karachi. Ara tumi tadera kache chile na yakhana tara tadera kalama niksepa karachila tadera madhye ke mariyamera bhara nebe se samparke, ara tumi tadera nikate chile na yakhana tara paraspara bacasa karachila.

Smarana karo! Phiris‌tara balale -- ''he mariyama, nihsandeha allah tomake susambada dicchena tamra tarapha theke ekati bani dbara -- tamra nama hacche masih‌, mariyama-putra isa, ihakale o parakale sam'manera yogya, ara naikatye anitadera antargata.
Ara tini lokadera sathe katha balabena dolanaya ebam bardhakyakale, ara tini sukarmidera an'yatama.’’

Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Kotha theke amara chele habe yakhana purusamanusa amaya sparsa kare ni?’’ Tini balalena -- ''e'ibhabe'i, -- allah ta'i srsti karena ya tini cana. Tini yakhana kono bisaye sid'dhanta karena, tini takhana se sanbandhe sudhu balena -- ''ha'o’’ ara ta haye yaya.
Ara tini tamke sekhabena kitaba o jnanabhandara, ara ta'orata o inajila.

Ara isara'ila bansiyadera jan'ya rasula. 'Nihsandeha ami tomadera kache asachi tomadera prabhura kacha theke ekati nidarsana niye, ami abasya'i tomadera jan'ya mati theke tairi kari pakhira mato murti, tarapara tate ami phutkara di'i, takhana seti pakhi haye yaya allah‌ra icchaya. Ara ami arogya kari andhake o kustha rugike, ara ami jibana di'i mrtake allah‌ra icchaya. Ara ami tomadera khabara di'i yesaba tomara khabe ara ya tomara nijedera barite majuta rakho. Nihsandeha ete bisesa nidarsana ache tomadera jan'ya yadi tomara bisbasi ha'o.

Ara ta'oratera ya-kichu amara kache chila ami tara pratipadaka, ara ami yate tomadera jan'ya baidha karate pari kono kono bisaya ya tomadera jan'ya nisid'dha hayechila, ara ami tomadera kache esechi tomadera prabhura kacha theke ekati bani niye, ata'eba allah‌ke bhaya-srad'dha karo o amara anugata ha'o.
Nihsandeha allah amara prabhu o tomadera'o prabhu, ata'eba tamra'i upasana karo, -- e'i hacche sahaja-sathika patha.’’

Kintu yakhana isa tadera madhye abisbasa bodha karalena, tini balalena -- ''kara allah‌ra pathe amara sahayyakari habe?’’ Ha'oyarira balale -- ''amara allah‌ra sahayyakari haba, amara allah‌te bisbasa kari, ara tumi saksya da'o ye amara hacchi a‌tmasamarpanakari.
Amadera prabhu! Amara imana enechi tate ya tumi abatarana karecha, ara amara rasulake anusarana kari, ata'eba amadera likhe rakha saksyadatadera sathe.’’
Ara tara cakranta karechila, ara allah‌o parikalpana karechilena. Ara allah parikalpanakaridera madhye sarbottama.
